00079

00083 //== IMPLEMENTATION ===========================================================
00084 
00085 
00114 class _OFFReader_ : public BaseReader
00115 {
00116 public:
00117 
00118   _OFFReader_();
00119 
00121   virtual ~_OFFReader_() {};
00122 
00123   std::string get_description() const { return "Object File Format"; }
00124   std::string get_extensions()  const { return "off"; }
00125   std::string get_magic()       const { return "OFF"; }
00126 
00127   bool read(const std::string& _filename,
00128             BaseImporter& _bi,
00129             Options& _opt);
00130 
00131   bool can_u_read(const std::string& _filename) const;
00132 
00133   bool read(std::istream& _in, BaseImporter& _bi, Options& _opt );
00134 
00135 private:
00136 
00137   bool can_u_read(std::istream& _is) const;
00138 
00139   bool read_ascii(std::istream& _in, BaseImporter& _bi) const;
00140   bool read_binary(std::istream& _in, BaseImporter& _bi, bool swap) const;
00141 
00142   void readValue(std::istream& _in, float& _value) const;
00143   void readValue(std::istream& _in, int& _value) const;
00144   void readValue(std::istream& _in, unsigned int& _value) const;
00145 
00146   int getColorType(std::string & _line, bool _texCoordsAvailable) const;
00147 
00148   //available options for reading
00149   mutable Options options_;
00150   //options that the user wants to read
00151   mutable Options userOptions_;
00152 };
